tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE distances (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    point1_latitude FLOAT,
    point1_longitude FLOAT,
    point2_latitude FLOAT,
    point2_longitude FLOAT
)

CREATE TABLE distance (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    location1_id INT,
    location2_id INT,
    distance FLOAT,
    FOREIGN KEY (location1_id) REFERENCES location(id),
    FOREIGN KEY (location2_id) REFERENCES location(id)
);
CREATE TABLE points (point_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY, latitude DECIMAL, longitude DECIMAL);
CREATE TABLE distances (distance_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY, start_point_id INT, end_point_id INT, distance DECIMAL);
CREATE TABLE calculations (calculation_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY, calculation_name TEXT);
CREATE TABLE users (user_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY, username TEXT, email TEXT);
CREATE TABLE logs (log_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY, log_date DATE, description TEXT);
